settings.update-check.name: Check for available updates?
settings.log-level.name: Log Level
settings.log-level.hint: The level of console log statements that should be displayed in the console.

show-munch-top.name: Munch button be at the top?

settings.custom-proxy.name: Use a custom proxy?
settings.custom-proxy.hint: Tick if using a custom proxy and enter the proxy URL's below
settings.image-upload-directory.name: Character image upload directory
settings.image-upload-directory.hint: Specifies the image upload location on the server.
settings.other-image-upload-directory.name: Other image upload directory
settings.other-image-upload-directory.hint: Specifies the image upload location on the server.
settings.frame-image-upload-directory.name: Image upload directory for frames
settings.frame-image-upload-directory.hint: Specifies the frame image upload location on the server.
settings.scene-upload-directory.name: Scene upload directory
settings.scene-upload-directory.hint: Specifies the scene upload location on the server.
settings.adventure-import-path.name: Adventure Import Path
settings.adventure-import-path.hint: Location where the module will look for adventure data files to import
settings.adventure-upload-path.name: Adventure Upload Path
settings.adventure-upload-path.hint: Location where the module will upload adventure images and data
settings.adventure-misc-path.name: Adventure Misc Upload Path
settings.adventure-misc-path.hint: Location where the module will upload misc adventure e.g. icons, this should not be an S3 location
settings.monster-link-title.name: Monster D&D Beyond link in title bar?
settings.monster-link-title.hint: Otherwise it's a button next to the name. (Reload to take effect).
settings.cobalt-cookie.name: DDB Cobalt Cookie
settings.cobalt-cookie.hint: You can get this using my Chrome extension https://github.com/MrPrimate/ddb-importer-chrome
settings.campaign-id.name: DDB Campaign URL or ID
settings.campaign-id.hint: Enter the campaign URL or ID, e.g. https://www.dndbeyond.com/campaigns/12345 or 12345
settings.beta-key.name: Patreon supporter Beta Key
settings.beta-key.hint: Some Patreon supporter tiers have access to Beta features, enter your key here
settings.auto-create-compendium.name: Auto create compendiums if not present?
settings.auto-create-compendium.hint: Auto create compendiums if not present?
settings.use-full-source.name: Use full source book name?
settings.monster-has-vision.name: Should imported monster have vision set?
settings.monster-has-vision.hint: If unticked monsters will not have vision set
settings.restrict-to-trusted.name: Restrict to Trusted Users
settings.restrict-to-trusted.hint: Restrict character import to Trusted Users
settings.allow-all-sync.name: Allow all users to sync to DDB
settings.allow-all-sync.hint: If character import is restricted, this option will still allow players to sync back to DDB.
settings.setup.name: Core setup
settings.compendium-setup.name: Compendiums
settings.folder-setup.name: Directory Locations
settings.folder-setup.hint: Chose the folders/directories to store images
settings.dynamic-update-setup.name: Dynamic DDB Update Setup
settings.dynamic-update-setup.hint: Push character updates straight back to D&D Beyond!
settings.character-link-title.name: Character DDB-Importer button in title bar?
settings.character-link-title.hint: Otherwise it's a button next to the name. (Reload to take effect).
settings.link-title-colour-white.name: Make title bar icon white?
settings.link-title-colour-white.hint: Default is Red. Reload to take effect.
settings.use-damage-hints.name: Use damage type hints?
settings.use-damage-hints.hint: When building damage strings e.g. 1d6[healing]. Useful for MidiQOL etc.
settings.add-damage-restrictions-to-hints.name: Add restrictions to damage hint?
settings.add-damage-restrictions-to-hints.hint: If a damage restriction is in place, add this to the damage hint
settings.allow-scene-download.name: Allow Download of Scene Data
settings.allow-scene-download.hint: If you wish to submit data for walls and lighting of a scene use this option to download a config file for submission.
settings.munching-selection-compendium-folders-mo: If using compendium folders, what kind of folders do you want the muncher to create?
settings.munching-selection-compendium-folders-sp: If using compendium folders, what kind of folders do you want the muncher to create?
settings.munching-selection-compendium-folders-it: If using compendium folders, what kind of folders do you want the muncher to create?

embed-macros.name: Embed macros in items?
embed-macros.hint: Embed macros into items? If not selected, item macro will call DDB Importer to generate and run the appropriate macro on the fly. Advantages: don't need to remunch spells to get macro, less data stored in world. Disadvantages: harder to debug, need to be running DDB Importer.

settings.show-image-to-players.name: Show the show image to players button?
settings.show-image-to-players.hint: In journals provide hover-over button to show image to players? (Reload required)
settings.show-read-alouds-button.name: Show the show read aloud to players button?
settings.show-read-alouds-button.hint: In journals provide hover-over button to show the read aloud to players? (Reload required)

ResetSettings.Label: Reset DDB Importer Settings
ResetSettings.Hint: WARNING this will reset all DDB Importer settings to their default values.
ResetSettings.Title: DDB Importer | Reset Settings
ResetSettings.Content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the DDB Importer module settings' to their defaults?
